snippet: The company debuted “Analogy/Dora: Tramontane,” about the experiences of Mr. Jones’s mother-in-law during World War II, at Montclair State University.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews premiere of dance piece Analogy/Dora: Tramontane, choreographed and performed by Bill T Jones/Arnie Zane Dance Company at Montclair State University's Alexander Kasser Theater in Montclair, NJ; piece is part of Peak Performances series.
lead_paragraph: The company debuted “Analogy/Dora: Tramontane,” about the experiences of Mr. Jones’s mother-in-law during World War II, at Montclair State University.

headline.main: Review: Bill T. Jones/Arnie Zane Summons a Life During Wartime
headline.print_headline: A Life During Wartime, Recalled Through Dance

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Jones, Bill T/Arnie Zane Dance Co
